statements: SELECT * FROM election_data;
SELECT voter_id, candidate_name FROM election_data WHERE voting_district = 1;
SELECT candidate_name, voting_district FROM election_data ORDER BY vote_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM election_data WHERE voter_id = 1001;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM election_data WHERE voting_district IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM election_data WHERE voting_district = 1 ORDER BY voter_id DESC;
SELECT candidate_name, COUNT(*) AS vote_count FROM election_data GROUP BY candidate_name HAVING vote_count > 100;
SELECT voter_id, candidate_name, voting_district, vote_timestamp FROM election_data WHERE vote_timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT voter_id, candidate_name FROM election_data WHERE voting_district BETWEEN 1 AND 3 ORDER BY vote_timestamp ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT voting_district FROM election_data ORDER BY voting_district;
SELECT voter_name, party_affiliation FROM election_voters WHERE vote_cast = TRUE
SELECT voter_name, vote_timestamp FROM election_voters ORDER BY vote_timestamp DESC
SELECT candidate_name, votes_received FROM election_results WHERE election_year = 2022
SELECT voter_name, party_affiliation FROM election_voters WHERE party_affiliation = 'Independent'
SELECT candidate_name, votes_received FROM election_results ORDER BY votes_received DESC
SELECT * FROM election_voters WHERE voter_id = 123;
SELECT voter_name, party_affiliation FROM election_voters ORDER BY voter_name DESC;
SELECT candidate_name, votes_received FROM election_results WHERE votes_received > 1000;
SELECT voter_name, party_affiliation, vote_cast FROM election_voters WHERE vote_cast = TRUE ORDER BY voter_name, party_affiliation DESC;
SELECT * FROM election_results WHERE election_year = 2022 AND election_round = 1 ORDER BY votes_received DESC;
SELECT * FROM election_voters;
SELECT voter_id, voter_name, age FROM election_voters WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM election_candidates ORDER BY party_affiliation DESC;
SELECT candidate_name, political_experience FROM election_candidates WHERE political_experience >= 5;
SELECT voter_id, COUNT(vote_id) AS vote_count FROM election_votes GROUP BY voter_id;
SELECT * FROM election_voters WHERE age >= 18;
SELECT voter_name, age, occupation FROM election_voters WHERE occupation = 'Teacher';
SELECT candidate_name, party_affiliation FROM election_candidates ORDER BY party_affiliation ASC;
SELECT voter_name, candidate_name, voting_date FROM election_voters v JOIN election_votes vt ON v.voter_id = vt.voter_id JOIN election_candidates c ON vt.candidate_id = c.candidate_id;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT voter_id) AS total_voters, COUNT(DISTINCT candidate_id) AS total_candidates FROM election_votes;
SELECT * FROM voters ORDER BY voter_id DESC;
SELECT voter_name, voter_age FROM voters WHERE voter_location = 'New York';
SELECT candidate_name, candidate_party FROM candidates WHERE candidate_position = 'President';
SELECT * FROM votes WHERE election_id = 1 AND voter_id = 1001;
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_votes FROM votes WHERE candidate_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM voters;
SELECT voter_name, voter_age FROM voters WHERE voter_age > 30;
SELECT candidate_name, candidate_position FROM candidates WHERE candidate_party = 'Democratic';
SELECT voter_name, election_date, election_location FROM voters JOIN votes ON voters.voter_id = votes.voter_id JOIN elections ON votes.election_id = elections.election_id;

SELECT voter_name, candidate_name, election_type FROM votes JOIN voters ON votes.voter_id = voters.voter_id JOIN candidates ON votes.candidate_id = candidates.candidate_id JOIN elections ON votes.election_id = elections.election_id WHERE voter_age <= 30 AND candidate_party = 'Republican';
SELECT * FROM voters;
SELECT voter_name, age FROM voters WHERE party_affiliation = 'Republican';
SELECT v.voter_name, e.election_name, v.vote_timestamp FROM votes v JOIN elections e ON v.election_id = e.election_id;
SELECT c.candidate_name, e.election_name FROM candidates c JOIN elections e ON c.election_id = e.election_id WHERE c.candidate_party = 'Independent';
SELECT v.voter_name, v.age, e.election_date FROM voters v JOIN votes vt ON v.voter_id = vt.voter_id JOIN elections e ON vt.election_id = e.election_id WHERE vt.vote_option = 'Yes';
SELECT voter_name, age FROM voters WHERE party_affiliation = 'Republican';
SELECT * FROM votes WHERE vote_option = 'Republican' ORDER BY vote_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT election_name, state_name FROM elections INNER JOIN states ON elections.state_id = states.state_id WHERE election_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT candidate_name, candidate_party FROM candidates ORDER BY candidate_party, candidate_name;
SELECT voter_name, age, party_affiliation FROM voters WHERE age >= 18 AND age < 30 ORDER BY voter_name ASC;
